channel.title: [Q] How many of you would play a custom rsc server?
channel.description: I was wondering how many people would play a rsc-based game that would have a custom landscape, items, quests, people, wildy etc... It would be the same quality as the normal rsc and wouldn't be stupid like the servers that have random rune armour sitting on the ground.

item.title: [Q] How many of you would play a custom rsc server?
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

Best effort was Mr. Zain’s Admar Online, that landscape really impressed me back in the day.

Is that the server with runecrafting?

Read full topic
item.source: [Q] How many of you would play a custom rsc server?

item.source: [Q] How many of you would play a custom rsc server?

item.title: [Q] How many of you would play a custom rsc server?
item.dc:creator: @Godandjesus Godandjesus
item.description:
@Godandjesus wrote:

[quote=“roflcopterofl, post:5, topic:393203”][quote author=Godandjesus link=topic=490373.msg3585823#msg3585823 date=1304179886]

custom landscape, items, quests, people, wildy - all been done before, many times.

try something unique

Nobody has ever done it properly.
[/quote]
I’m talking about complete new landscape, newly or recorded items, custom good quests, redraw or edited npcs.[/quote]

I would give it a try.

Read full topic
item.source: [Q] How many of you would play a custom rsc server?
